text: Junes Barny ( , ; born 4 November 1989) is a Swedish footballer who plays as a midfielder. He is of Moroccan descent. ==Career== ===Hammarby IF=== On 13 July 2018, Barny signed a short-term deal with Hammarby IF in Allsvenskan. He scored his first goal for the club on 27 August, in a 3–2 away win against Dalkurd FF. ===IFK Göteborg=== On 31 January 2019, Barny signed a two-year contract with IFK Göteborg, with an option for a further year. == Personal life == Barny is a dual national; he holds a Swedish EU passport as well as a Moroccan passport. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish people of Moroccan descent Category:Association football forwards Category:Högaborgs BK players Category:Ängelholms FF players Category:Halmstads BK players Category:GAIS players Category:Difaâ Hassani El Jadidi players Category:Hammarby Fotboll players Category:IFK Göteborg players Category:Allsvenskan players Category:Superettan players Category:Swedish footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Morocco
title: Junes Barny
